channel.title: Gauntlet Podcast 200th Episode
channel.description:
As a nice celebration for wrap up of GCOG and the middle of the year, we have the 200th Episode of the Gauntlet Podcast. On it @Auzumel_S, @swordqueen, and I bring on @RichRogers and Greg Gelder to discuss "how to be the best player you can be." It's an extra-long episode filled with useful ideas and shout outs to Gauntleteers. It's also a great jumping on point if you haven't check out the podcast before.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/episode-200-playing-rpgs

item.title: Gauntlet Podcast 200th Episode
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

As a nice celebration for wrap up of GCOG and the middle of the year, we have the 200th Episode of the Gauntlet Podcast. On it @Auzumel_S, @swordqueen, and I bring on @RichRogers and Greg Gelder to discuss “how to be the best player you can be.” It’s an extra-long episode filled with useful ideas and shout outs to Gauntleteers. It’s also a great jumping on point if you haven’t check out the podcast before.

THE GAUNTLET

Episode 200: Playing RPGs
